title: Haou no Tsuki - Akechi Mitsuhide Shougai
original_name: 覇王の月~明智光秀の生涯
sinopse: The Life of Akechi Mitsuhide — The trials and aspirations of a man who serves in the shadow of a great leader, Oda Nobunaga, like a moon that mirrors a blazing sun. But what happens when an incident at Hongan-ji leads to a change of heart in Mitsuhide? A long-running historical drama portrayed in fine detail. (Source: Jmanga)
